item.title: UGent Survivor Kit - A Serverless LLM-Agent Deployment
item.description:
ðŸŽ’ UGent TSA Survivor Kit | AI-Powered Community Platform

A serverless, AI-driven information hub designed to automate community management and solve information fragmentation for international students.

ðŸŽ¯ Motivation & Product Philosophy

UGent TSA Survivor Kit is a comprehensive survival guide platform originally engineered for students.
Following strategic discussions with the current association leadership, the platform’s scope was expanded to serve the entire Taiwanese expatriate community in Ghent.

“I built this not just as a developer, but as the former Student Association President who understood user needs and exactly why previous platforms failed.”

Drawing from my tenure as President, I identified a critical failure mode: student platforms often become obsolete due to high operational friction and the technical barriers required for maintenance.

Before writing a single line of code, I conducted user research and defined a strict engineering constraint: The system must be “Zero-Maintenance” for dynamic information (e.g., news, policies) and operable by non-tech staff. This domain insight drove the architectural decision to decouple the content from the code, using Google Sheets as a Headless CMS instead of a traditional database.

  • Role: Product Owner & Full-Stack Engineer
  • Scope: User Research â†’ Architecture Design â†’ Full-Stack Implementation â†’ CI/CD Automation

ðŸ›  Tech Stack

  • Frontend: Next.js 14 (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
  • Backend / CMS: Google Sheets API (NoSQL/CMS), Google Apps Script
  • AI & NLP: Python, Gemma 3 4B (LLM), Feedparser (RSS), Gspread
  • Infrastructure: Vercel (Serverless), GitHub Actions (CI/CD), Docker
  • Key Concepts: Serverless Architecture, Event-Driven ETL, Prompt Engineering, ISR

ðŸ’» Technical Architecture & Implementation

1. Serverless Full-Stack Architecture

Designed a cost-efficient, low-maintenance architecture suitable for long-term community operation:

  • Frontend (Next.js 14 + TS): Built a mobile-first, PWA-like interface using modular components (MainView, NewsFeed). Implemented Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) to ensure high performance and SEO while keeping data fresh (60s revalidation).
  • Backend (Google Sheets as CMS): abstracted Google Sheets into a JSON API endpoint using Google Apps Script. This “Serverless CMS” approach allows non-technical staff to manage content via a spreadsheet interface, eliminating database costs and server maintenance.

2. AI-Driven Intelligence Pipeline (Event-Driven ETL)

The core innovation is an automated pipeline that monitors, analyzes, and translates local news without human intervention:

  • Data Ingestion: A Python-based agent continuously scrapes municipal RSS feeds (stad.gent) and emergency alerts.
  • LLM Integration (Gemma 3 4B):
    • Deployed Gemma 3 4B to perform semantic analysis on raw Dutch texts.
    • Structured Prompt Engineering: Designed complex prompt templates to force the LLM to output valid JSON. Tasks include: Importance Grading (Level 1-3), Audience Classification (Student vs. Resident), Traditional Chinese Translation, and Summarization.
    • Robustness: Implemented retry logic with exponential backoff to handle API rate limits and ensure pipeline reliability.
  • ETL Execution: Structured data is automatically validated and written back to the Google Sheets CMS, triggering frontend updates.

3. CI/CD & DevOps

  • GitHub Actions: Orchestrated daily cron jobs (UTC 6:00) to execute the news crawling and AI analysis agents.
  • Security: Managed Service Accounts and API Keys via GitHub Secrets.
  • Containerization: Utilized Docker to ensure environment consistency across development and production agents.
  • Automated Deployment: Configured Vercel for automatic deployments on git push, achieving a production-ready lifecycle with 30+ stable deployments.

ðŸ“ˆ Key Results & Impact

  • âœ… 100% Automation: Achieved a fully automated loop for news gathering, translation, classification, and publishing.
  • âœ… Zero Operational Cost: Leveraged serverless tiers (Vercel, Google Sheets) to maintain a $0 monthly budget.
  • âœ… Sustainability: Solved the “technical debt” issue common in student organizations by creating a system that requires no coding skills to maintain.
  • âœ… Production-Ready: Validated through continuous uptime and real-world usage by the student community.
